Global emission trajectories of urban transport will be decided in rapidly urbanising Asia and Africa.

riation amongst cities with similar income and car ownership levels
While electrification is a key strategy to decarbonise urban transport, urban
infrastructures can make a difference of up to a factor of 10 in energy use and induced GHG emissions
